General.Name: Shantou Dongfeng Printing Co Ltd
General.Description: Shantou Dongfeng Printing Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of printing and paper packaging products. The company prints for tobacco, wine, cigarettes, pharmaceutical, food, power and energy storage batteries, consumer electronics, and other products. It also offers dairy products, consumer investment funds, e-cigarettes, and tobacco products. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Shantou, China.
